product_overview: Innova Digital Landing Page is a responsive, modern institutional website for Innova Digital featuring an AI-powered chatbot for automated customer service, a countdown to the VAP App launch, and comprehensive company and service information sections.
core_goals: Provide a professional and engaging online presence for Innova Digital.
Enable users to easily learn about the company, its services, and the upcoming VAP App.
Offer an intelligent chatbot that can answer queries related to company info and the VAP App.
Ensure the site is fully responsive across devices (mobile, tablet, desktop).
Facilitate user contact with the company via a contact form integrated with FormSubmit.
Implement a secure backend architecture protecting sensitive API keys and supporting chatbot functionality.
key_features: Responsive Navbar with mobile menu and WhatsApp contact button.
Hero section with engaging animations to welcome visitors.
About section detailing Innova Digital enterprise.
Services section showcasing the solutions offered by the company.
VAP App section featuring app information and a launch countdown timer (set for 19/02/2026).
Contact form integrated with FormSubmit for direct user inquiries.
Footer with comprehensive company information and social links.
AI-powered chatbot integrated using OpenAI and Google Gemini AI for contextual answers about the company and the VAP App.
Secure Express backend API handling chatbot requests with CORS and environment variable protection.
100% responsive design across devices and screen sizes.
user_flow_summary: User visits landing page and navigates through sections via Navbar.
User reads about the company, services, and VAP App details.
User interacts with the AI chatbot by typing questions related to Innova Digital or VAP App.
Chatbot processes user input via backend APIs using OpenAI and Google Gemini AI and returns relevant responses.
User uses the launch countdown to track VAP App release date (19 February 2026).
User submits inquiries through the contact form which sends messages via FormSubmit.
User accesses contact info and social media links through the footer and navbar WhatsApp button.
validation_criteria: All UI components render correctly and adapt responsively to various screen sizes.
Chatbot answers accurately and only on permitted topics: company info, VAP App functionalities, launch, pricing, and contact details.
No chatbot responses related to medical, diagnostic, or clinical advice are provided.
API keys remain secure and are not exposed in the frontend codebase or public repos.
Contact form submissions are correctly sent and received through FormSubmit.
Launch countdown timer accurately displays time remaining until 19 February 2026.
Navigation links and menus function correctly including mobile menu toggling.
All external links (WhatsApp, social media) open correctly in new tabs or appropriate apps.
Backend services handle CORS, environment variables, and security best practices appropriately.
